Actual source code: slepcblaslapack.h

slepc-3.8.0 2017-10-20
Report Typos and Errors

  2:    - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

  8:    - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
  9: */
 10: /*
 11:    Necessary routines in BLAS and LAPACK not included in petscblaslapack.h
 12: */

 16: #include <petscblaslapack.h>

 18: /* Macro to check nonzero info after LAPACK call */
 19: #define SlepcCheckLapackInfo(routine,info) \
 20:   do { \
 21:     if (info) SETERRQ2(PETSC_COMM_SELF,PETSC_ERR_LIB,"Error in LAPACK subroutine %s: info=%d",routine,(int)info); \
 22:   } while (0)

 24: /* Macros for building LAPACK names */
 25: #if defined(PETSC_BLASLAPACK_UNDERSCORE)
 26: #if defined(PETSC_USE_REAL_SINGLE)
 27: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) s##lcase##_
 28: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 29: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) c##lcase##_
 30: #else
 31: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) s##lcase##_
 32: #endif
 33: #elif defined(PETSC_USE_REAL___FLOAT128)
 34: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) q##lcase##_
 35: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 36: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) w##lcase##_
 37: #else
 38: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) q##lcase##_
 39: #endif
 40: #else
 41: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) d##lcase##_
 42: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 43: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) z##lcase##_
 44: #else
 45: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) d##lcase##_
 46: #endif
 47: #endif

 49: #elif defined(PETSC_BLASLAPACK_CAPS) || defined(PETSC_BLASLAPACK_STDCALL)
 50: #if defined(PETSC_USE_REAL_SINGLE)
 51: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) S##ucase
 52: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 53: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) C##ucase
 54: #else
 55: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) S##ucase
 56: #endif
 57: #elif defined(PETSC_USE_REAL___FLOAT128)
 58: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) Q##ucase
 59: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 60: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) W##ucase
 61: #else
 62: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) Q##ucase
 63: #endif
 64: #else
 65: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) D##ucase
 66: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 67: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) Z##ucase
 68: #else
 69: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) D##ucase
 70: #endif
 71: #endif

 73: #else
 74: #if defined(PETSC_USE_REAL_SINGLE)
 75: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) s##lcase
 76: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 77: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) c##lcase
 78: #else
 79: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) s##lcase
 80: #endif
 81: #elif defined(PETSC_USE_REAL___FLOAT128)
 82: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) q##lcase
 83: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 84: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) w##lcase
 85: #else
 86: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) q##lcase
 87: #endif
 88: #else
 89: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lcase,ucase) d##lcase
 90: #if defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
 91: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) z##lcase
 92: #else
 93: #define SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lcase,ucase) d##lcase
 94: #endif
 95: #endif

 97: #endif

 99: /* LAPACK return type: we assume slange, etc. behave in the same way as snrm2 */
100: #if defined(PETSC_USE_REAL_SINGLE) && defined(PETSC_BLASLAPACK_SNRM2_RETURNS_DOUBLE)
101: #define SlepcLRT double
102: #else
103: #define SlepcLRT PetscReal
104: #endif

106: /* LAPACK functions without string parameters */
107: #define LAPACKlaev2_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(laev2,LAEV2)
108: #define LAPACKgehrd_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(gehrd,GEHRD)
109: #define LAPACKgelqf_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(gelqf,GELQF)
110: #define LAPACKgeqp3_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(geqp3,GEQP3)
111: #define LAPACKtgexc_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(tgexc,TGEXC)
112: #define LAPACKlarfg_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(larfg,LARFG)
113: #define LAPACKlag2_  SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lag2,LAG2)
114: #define LAPACKlasv2_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lasv2,LASV2)
115: #define LAPACKlartg_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lartg,LARTG)
116: #define LAPACKlaln2_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(laln2,LALN2)
117: #define LAPACKlaed4_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(laed4,LAED4)
118: #define LAPACKlamrg_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lamrg,LAMRG)
119: #define LAPACKlapy2_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lapy2,LAPY2)
120: #if !defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
121: #define LAPACKorghr_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(orghr,ORGHR)
122: #else
123: #define LAPACKorghr_ SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(unghr,UNGHR)
124: #endif
125: /* the next one needs a special treatment due to the special names:
126:    srot, drot, csrot, zdrot */
127: #if !defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
128: #define BLASrot_     SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(rot,ROT)
129: #else
130: #if defined(PETSC_USE_REAL_SINGLE)
131: #define BLASrot_     SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(srot,SROT)
132: #elif defined(PETSC_USE_REAL___FLOAT128)
133: #define BLASrot_     SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(qrot,QROT)
134: #else
135: #define BLASrot_     SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(drot,DROT)
136: #endif
137: #endif

139: /* LAPACK functions with string parameters */
140: #if !defined(PETSC_BLASLAPACK_STDCALL)

142: /* same name for real and complex */
143: #define LAPACKlanhs_(a,b,c,d,e) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lanhs,LANHS) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),1)
144: #define LAPACKlange_(a,b,c,d,e,f) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lange,LANGE) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),1)
145: #define LAPACKggevx_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u,v,w,x,y,z,aa,ab,ac) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(ggevx,GGEVX) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t),(u),(v),(w),(x),(y),(z),(aa),(ab),(ac),1,1,1,1)
146: #define LAPACKggev_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(ggev,GGEV) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),1,1)
147: #define LAPACKpbtrf_(a,b,c,d,e,f) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(pbtrf,PBTRF) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),1)
148: #define LAPACKlarf_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(larf,LARF) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),1)
149: #define BLAStrmm_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(trmm,TRMM) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),1,1,1,1)
150: #define LAPACKlacpy_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lacpy,LACPY) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),1)
151: #define LAPACKlascl_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lascl,LASCL) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),1)
152: #define LAPACKlansy_(a,b,c,d,e,f) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lansy,LANSY) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),1,1)
153: #define LAPACKlaset_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(laset,LASET) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),1)
154: #define LAPACKtrsyl_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(trsyl,TRSYL) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),1,1)
155: #define LAPACKtrtri_(a,b,c,d,e,f) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(trtri,TRTRI) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),1,1)
156: /* subroutines in which we use only the real version, do not care whether they have different name */
157: #define LAPACKstevr_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t) SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(stevr,STEVR) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t),1,1)
158: #define LAPACKbdsdc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n) SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(bdsdc,BDSDC) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),1,1)
159: #define LAPACKlamch_(a) SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lamch,LAMCH) ((a),1)
160: #define LAPACKlamc3_(a,b) SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lamc3,LAMC3) ((a),(b))

162: #if !defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
163: /* different name or signature, real */
164: #define LAPACKsyevr_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(syevr,SYEVR) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t),(u),1,1,1)
165: #define LAPACKsyevd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(syevd,SYEVD) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),1,1)
166: #define LAPACKsygvd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n)  SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(sygvd,SYGVD) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),1,1)
167: #define LAPACKormlq_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(ormlq,ORMLQ) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),1,1)
168: #define LAPACKorgtr_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(orgtr,ORGTR) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),1)
169: #define LAPACKsytrd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(sytrd,SYTRD) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),1)
170: #define LAPACKtrevc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(trevc,TREVC) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),1,1)
171: #define LAPACKgeevx_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u,v,w) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(geevx,GEEVX) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t),(u),(v),(w),1,1,1,1)
172: #define LAPACKgees_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(gees,GEES) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),1,1)
173: #define LAPACKtrexc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(trexc,TREXC) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),1)
174: #define LAPACKgesdd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(gesdd,GESDD) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),1)
175: #define LAPACKtgevc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(tgevc,TGEVC) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),1,1)
176: #define LAPACKhsein_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(hsein,HSEIN) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),1,1,1)
177: #define LAPACKstedc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(stedc,STEDC) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),1)
178: #else
179: /* different name or signature, complex */
180: #define LAPACKsyevr_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u,v,w) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(heevr,HEEVR) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t),(u),(v),(w),1,1,1)
181: #define LAPACKsyevd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(heevd,HEEVD) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),1,1)
182: #define LAPACKsygvd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(hegvd,HEGVD) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),1,1)
183: #define LAPACKormlq_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(unmlq,UNMLQ) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),1,1)
184: #define LAPACKorgtr_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(ungtr,UNGTR) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),1)
185: #define LAPACKsytrd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(hetrd,HETRD) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),1)
186: #define LAPACKtrevc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(trevc,TREVC) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),1,1)
187: #define LAPACKgeevx_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u,v) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(geevx,GEEVX) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t),(u),(v),1,1,1,1)
188: #define LAPACKgees_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(gees,GEES) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),1,1)

190: #define LAPACKgesdd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(gesdd,GESDD) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),1)
191: #define LAPACKtgevc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(tgevc,TGEVC) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),1,1)
192: #define LAPACKhsein_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(hsein,HSEIN) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),1,1,1)
193: #define LAPACKstedc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(stedc,STEDC) ((a),(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),1)
194: #endif

196: #else /* PETSC_BLASLAPACK_STDCALL */

198: /* same name for real and complex */
199: #define LAPACKlanhs_(a,b,c,d,e) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lanhs,LANHS) ((a),1,(b),(c),(d),(e))
200: #define LAPACKlange_(a,b,c,d,e,f) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lange,LANGE) ((a),1,(b),(c),(d),(e),(f))
201: #define LAPACKggevx_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u,v,w,x,y,z,aa,ab,ac) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(ggevx,GGEVX) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),1,(d),1,(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t),(u),(v),(w),(x),(y),(z),(aa),(ab),(ac))
202: #define LAPACKggev_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(ggev,GGEV) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q))
203: #define LAPACKpbtrf_(a,b,c,d,e,f) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(pbtrf,PBTRF) ((a),1,(b),(c),(d),(e),(f))
204: #define LAPACKlarf_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(larf,LARF) ((a),1,(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i))
205: #define BLAStrmm_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(trmm,TRMM) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),1,(d),1,(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k))
206: #define LAPACKlacpy_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lacpy,LACPY) ((a),1,(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g))
207: #define LAPACKlascl_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lascl,LASCL) ((a),1,(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j))
208: #define LAPACKlansy_(a,b,c,d,e,f) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(lansy,LANSY) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),(d),(e),(f))
209: #define LAPACKlaset_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(laset,LASET) ((a),1,(b),(c),(d),(e),(f),(g))

211: #define LAPACKtrtri_(a,b,c,d,e,f) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(trtri,TRTRI) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),(d),(e),(f))
212: /* subroutines in which we use only the real version, do not care whether they have different name */
213: #define LAPACKstevr_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t) SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(stevr,STEVR) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t))
214: #define LAPACKbdsdc_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n) SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(bdsdc,BDSDC) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n))

216: #define LAPACKlamc3_(a,b) SLEPC_BLASLAPACKREAL(lamc3,LAMC3) ((a),(b))

218: #if !defined(PETSC_USE_COMPLEX)
219: /* different name or signature, real */
220: #define LAPACKsyevr_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n,o,p,q,r,s,t,u) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(syevr,SYEVR) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),1,(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n),(o),(p),(q),(r),(s),(t),(u))
221: #define LAPACKsyevd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(syevd,SYEVD) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k))
222: #define LAPACKsygvd_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m,n)  SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(sygvd,SYGVD) ((a),(b),1,(c),1,(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m),(n))
223: #define LAPACKormlq_(a,b,c,d,e,f,g,h,i,j,k,l,m) SLEPC_BLASLAPACK(ormlq,ORMLQ) ((a),1,(b),1,(c),(d),(e),(f),(g),(h),(i),(j),(k),(l),(m))
